amendment.description: To authorize the Commission to implement a nationwide "Do Not E-mail" registry.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1892 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1892 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S13024-13026, S13027; text: CR S13024) To authorize the Commission to implement a nationwide "Do Not E-mail" registry.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1892 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1892 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
